title: Crashing in Champ Select
body:
Recently in one out of about five games I have noticed that my champion select either loads into a black screen then crashes or, more commonly, it laggs out during one of the animations then crashes. I normally never dodge. Even with a troll on my team I still play out the game for fun but this glitch/bug/problem is forcing me to dodge. My dodge penalty timer is now up to 15 minutes and I'm worried it will get so high I will not be able to play anymore. 

I have strong wifi and a fast computer and usually run at about 130- 180 fps with 25- 40 ping.

Thanks for any help whatsoever,

TheRisingKing

replies.body:
Crashes in champ select are typically caused by the client disconnecting from the game platform service enough to drop connection entirely. I reckon working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) may resolve this issue for you.

Let me know how those steps worked for you.
